description: The meta result is used in HTTP-API-requests and has only debugging purposes.

error.description: true if request was not successful

generated.description: iso8601 date time string of generation on the server

length.description: number of items in the data block

message.description: contains additional information if property error is true

retryAfter.description: contains retry after information on status code 429

reducedData.description: has reduced data, do not use for saving data
